title: Forward Operating Base Fuel Resupply
description: A logistics officer must reroute a fuel convoy after its primary route is compromised by enemy activity.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the route compromise alert and retrieve the convoy's current location and fuel status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly identifies the convoy's position and remaining fuel.

tasks.description: Analyze alternate routes, considering threat levels, road conditions, and travel time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer identifies the safest and most efficient alternate route.

tasks.description: Issue new orders to the convoy commander with the updated route and request air cover for a high-threat portion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer successfully re-tasks the convoy and coordinates for support.
